script: function(obsel,auto){drawnObsel = document.createElementNS('http://www.w3.org/2000/svg','circle');drawnObsel.setAttributeNS(null,'cx', '' || auto.x );drawnObsel.setAttributeNS(null,'cy', '60' || auto.y );drawnObsel.setAttributeNS(null,'r', '' || auto.r );drawnObsel.setAttributeNS(null,'style','fill: yellow; stroke: black');return drawnObsel;}
